titles.title: Gathered In Thy Name Lord Jesus (easy nice tun

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Gathered in Thy name Lord Jesus Losing sight of all but Thee O what joy Thy presence gives us Calling up our hearts to Thee{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Loved with love which knows no measure Save the Father's love to Thee Blessed Lord our hearts would treasure All the Father's thoughts of Thee{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}All His joy his rest his pleasure All His deep delight in Thee Lord Thy heart alone can measure What Thy Father found in Thee{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}How He set His love upon Thee Called Thee His beloved Son Yet for us He did not spare Thee By Thy death our life was won{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O the joy the wondrous singing When we see Thee as Thou art Thy blest name Lord Jesus bringing Sweetest music to God's heart{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Notes of gladness songs unceasing Hymns of everlasting praise Psalms of glory joy increasing Through God's endless day of days{/lang-eng}
